# My Dashboard Docker Project

## Tools Used
- Docker
- Docker Compose
- GitHub Actions
- AWS ECR
- AWS EC2
- Node.js

## Project Workflow
1. Write the application (dashboard.js)
2. Containerize using Dockerfile
3. Push image automatically using GitHub Actions
4. Store container images in AWS ECR
5. Deploy on EC2 using Docker Compose
6. View the running app in browser via EC2 public IP
